HyperTIES Database: Hubble Space Telescope

Index of Files:

  • index.st0: Storyboard file: Master Index.
  • index.sty: Style file: Master Index Style.
  • article.sty: Style file: Article Style.
  • db.sty: Style file: General Database Style.
  • titlepage.sty: Style file: Title Page Stile.
  • master-index: Master index file: HyperTIES Master Index.
  • compile-all.f: Forth file: Utility to compile database into Forth executable.
  • compiled.f: Forth file: Formatted database compiled into Forth source code.
  • earth: Directory: Spin the Earth.
  • faintobj: Directory: Faint Object Spectrograph.
  • faintobk: Directory: Faint Object Camera.
  • fineguid: Directory: Fine Guidance Sensors.
  • focexplo: Directory: Faint Object Camera - exploded view.
  • fosexplo: Directory: Faint Object Spectrograph - Exploded view.
  • goddards: Directory: Goddard Space Flight Center.
  • highreso: Directory: High Resolution Spectrograph.
  • highspee: Directory: High Speed Photometer.
  • hrsexplo: Directory: High Resolution Spectrograph - exploded view.
  • hspexplo: Directory: High Speed Photometer - exploded view.
  • introduc: Directory: Why the Hubble Space Telescope?
  • opticalt: Directory: Optical Telescope Assembly.
  • orbview: Directory: The Space Telescope in Orbit.
  • otadiagr: Directory: Optical Telescope Assembly - diagram.
  • particip: Directory: Participating Organizations.
  • projectr: Directory: Project Responsibilities.
  • scientif: Directory: Scientific Instruments.
  • spacetel: Directory: Hubble Space Telescope - Main View.
  • spacetem: Directory: Space Telescope Science Institute.
  • ssmexplo: Directory: Support Systems Module - Exploded View.
  • supports: Directory: Support Systems Module.
  • wfpcexpl: Directory: Wide Field/Planetary Camera - exploded view.
  • widefiel: Directory: Wide Field/Planetary Camera.
